title: Disconnect from game try to reconnect but stuck with reconnect button.
body:
Disconnected from game and attempt to reconnect. Say failed and gives option to retry, but learned everyone in game also disconnected. Though the game is considered to be on going and we are all stuck outside not able to connect.
Edit 1: am still connected to chat and friended two of the people on my team and they say they're stuck as well.

replies.body: There were some ISP issues that had occurred over the past couple of days, but they have been resolved since then! If you're still having connection issues though make sure to reach back out to me. I'll look for a solution to get you back into the game.

thats a strange issue, i remember back in season 2 and 3 i kept getting the firewall error and couldnt connect to half of my games until about 2-3 mins into them, took me forever to figure out it was my modem not playing nicely with league, but this doesnt seem to be the case, i hope that isnt a ranked game friend :(
